Action.Name: Box.Bump
Action.Description: Calls a script from the specified Box.

Action.Name: Box.Close
Action.Description: Stops the execution of a script in the specified Box.

Action.Name: Box.Empty
Action.Description: Empties the specified Box and frees it to receive input.

Action.Name: Box.Fill
Action.Description: Puts a script into the specified Box.

Arg.Name: Fill Type
Arg.Description: Whether the box is being filled by a file or a string.

Arg.Name: Script
Arg.Description: The script string or the file path the script file.
Arg.Default: "Dialog.Message(\"Wow! This is cool.\", \"And I found it in a Box!\");"

EasyMode.Default: "Dialog.Message(\"Wow! This is cool.\", \"And I found it in a Box!\");"

Arg.Name: Interval
Arg.Description: The interval at which to repeat the script when the box is opened (in milliseconds).

Action.Name: Box.GetBumpInterval
Action.Description: Gets the interval at which the specified Box's script is called.

Action.Name: Box.GetClosedBoxes
Action.Description: Gets a list of all the closed Boxes.

Action.Name: Box.GetNames
Action.Description: Gets the names of all of the filled Boxes.

Action.Name: Box.GetOpenBoxes
Action.Description: Gets a list of all the open Boxes.

Action.Name: Box.GetScript
Action.Description: Gets the script contained in the specified Box.

Action.Name: Box.Initialize
Action.Description: Required action that must be called before any other Box plugin action.

Arg.Name: Max Boxes
Arg.Description: The maximum number of boxes to build.

Action.Name: Box.IsFull
Action.Description: Determines whether or not a Box has been filled.

Action.Name: Box.IsOpen
Action.Description: Determines whether or not a Box is open.

Action.Name: Box.Open
Action.Description: Starts the execution of a script in the specified Box and repeats the call at its interval.

Action.Name: Box.SetBumpInterval
Action.Description: Changes the interval at which the script in the specified Box is called.

Arg.Name: Interval
Arg.Description: The interval to which the Box will adhere (in millisends).

Arg.Note: To execute once (without repeating), simply bump the Box.

Action.ReturnValueDescription:
Returns the value of the box bump interval in milliseconds.
If the specified box does not exist then -2 is returned.

Returns a numerically indexed table whose values are the closed box names.
If no boxes exist or there are no closed boxes then nil is returned.

Returns a numerically indexed table whose values are the box names.
If no boxes exist then nil is returned.

Returns a numerically indexed table whose values are the open box names.
If no boxes exist or there are no open boxes then nil is returned.

Returns the script contained in a box.
If the specified box does not exist then a blank string is returned.

Arg.Note: It is not recommended to exceed 1000 due to the slowing effect it has on projects in excess of this amount.

Action.ReturnValueDescription: Returns true if the box is full. Returns false if it is not (or does not exist).
Returns true if the box is full. Returns false if it is not (or does not exist).

Extended.Name: Box
Extended.Description:
Allows for the simultaneous operation of the GUI and execution of one to many scripts. This is a fast and loose way of multithreading scripts.
Scripts can be repeated at specific intervals (Box,Open) or simply called once (Box.Bump).
Extended.Author: Centauri Soldier
Extended.License: Free to use and distribute (but not to wrap without permission)
Extended.InstallNotes: Put this script into your global functions.
